I possess a product-focused mindset, prioritizing user needs and collaboration for successful project outcomes.
In addition to my technical skills, I have a strong foundation in building high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My approach includes designing robust microservices architectures, implementing event-driven systems, and adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am also experienced in developing machine learning pipelines and utilizing tools such as MLflow and Airflow.
